      • createNetwork

        public com.github.dockerjava.api.command.CreateNetworkResponse createNetwork(@NotNull
                                                                             @NotNull java.lang.String name,
                                                                             java.lang.String driver,
                                                                             com.github.dockerjava.api.model.Network.Ipam ipam,
                                                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options,
                                                                             java.lang.Boolean checkDuplicate,
                                                                             java.lang.Boolean internal,
                                                                             java.lang.Boolean enableIPv6,
                                                                             java.lang.Boolean attachable)
        Creates a network.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the network.
        driver - The driver of the network (optional).
        ipam - The ipam of the network (optional).
        options - The options of the network (optional).
        checkDuplicate - true if you want to check if the network already exists, false otherwise (optional).
        internal - true if you want to restrict external access to the network, false otherwise (optional).
        enableIPv6 - true if you want to enable IPv6, false otherwise (optional).
        attachable - true if you want to attach the network to containers, false otherwise (optional).
        Returns:
        The created network.

      • disconnectFromNetwork

        public void disconnectFromNetwork(@NotNull
                                  @NotNull java.lang.String networkId,
                                  @NotNull
                                  @NotNull java.lang.String containerId,
                                  java.lang.Boolean force)
        Disconnects a container from a network.
        /!\ If you don't want to use a param marked as optional, simply pass null.
        Parameters:
        networkId - The id of the network.
        containerId - The id of the container.
        force - true if you want to force the disconnection, false otherwise (optional).
